Announcement / Notice

Public Announcement Temporary Closure of Sierra East Management Office

06 Dec 2020

Dear Sierra East Residents,

Kindy be informed that Management Office will be CLOSED due to recent EMCO Enforcement in our condo and the surrounding areas.

Management team still are working with local authoritis on the emergency cases support purposes.

In the meantime, please expect minimum support from cleners due to the restriction as they've issues entering the premises.

We will keep you posted if there are any new updates from the local authorities.

Please stay safe and follow Standard SOP's during this period.

For any emergencies please intercom Security Post.

Thank you.


From Sierra East Management


Building Management
